dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2384 IH: To prohibit any appropriation of funds for the National Labor Relations Board.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Salmon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To prohibit any appropriation of funds for the National Labor Relations Board.

section.text: No funds are authorized to be appropriated for the National Labor Relations Board.
